name: It's Not Me, It's You!
description:
For the Github Game-Off 2022

https://github.com/o-bedford/Github-Jam-2022

How to Play:

Play Phase - Select a card to play! That card will be placed on the board.

Trap Phase - After a card has been placed on the board, you can place down a trap card to modify it! Save up good trap cards to really irk your opponent.

Reach the win spot (12 pts), and finally break up with your partner!
